reviews.text: The pizza bakes so nicely. Very unique flavor combination to some of the speciality pizza

Nothing better than fresh baked pizza at home.  I wish there were more ‚Äútake n bake‚Äù places. This is definitely one of my favorite pizza places in Columbus.  Gourmet. Quality ingredients. Fair price. It‚Äôs not delivery, it‚Äôs Mama Mimi‚Äôs.

Was recommended Mama Mimi‚Äôs by a coworker and it did not disappoint! The crust was a great balance of puffy and crispy on the bottom, and it baked SUPER fast!
It also reminded me how nice take-and-bake style can be ‚Äî my order was for a get together and it was fun to serve pizza fresh from the oven. üçïüíõ

Amazing pizza! I never thought take n bake pizza would be this good but it exceeded all my expectations‚Ä¶ definitely a must when visiting family in Columbus. Staff was super friendly and helpful when picking up the pizza.

Mama Mimi‚Äôs has been my personal favorite pizza for over 20 years. I know it‚Äôs take and bake pizza but it‚Äôs better than any pizza you could get delivered or make yourself. The ingredients are so fresh and you just can‚Äôt beat them if you‚Äôve never tried it. do yourself a favor and try one of their three locations. And around the holidays, they have the world‚Äôs best cinnamon rolls

editorial_summary.overview: Small local chain selling uncooked gourmet pizzas & lasagne to bake at home, plus salads & desserts.

Best lasagna and very consistent. Heavy on the meat and sauce is excellent. Been regular for years!!

detailedReviews.text: The service was excellent, and I love the flavor and convenience of the pizzas here! I also love the many choices given here.

Was recommended Mama Mimi‚Äôs by a coworker and it did not disappoint! The crust was a great balance of puffy and crispy on the bottom, and it baked SUPER fast!
It also reminded me how nice take-and-bake style can be ‚Äî my order was for a get together and it was fun to serve pizza fresh from the oven. üçïüíõ

detailedReviews.author: Tim Leigh
detailedReviews.text: I've said it before but this is excellent pizza.  Fresh ingredients, nice blend of flavors on their specialty pizzas.  Staff is outstanding, by far the best gourmet take and bake.

detailedReviews.author: J J
detailedReviews.text: Honestly it‚Äôs pretty fire üî•

detailedReviews.author: Megan Murphy
detailedReviews.text: Always delighted with the service and food and convenience of being able to bake the pizzas on our own time line.

detailedReviews.author: Blake Harbert
detailedReviews.text:
Great pizza, fresh, coupons help sweeten the deal. Awesome customer service.
Will be back

detailedReviews.author: Kami Beer
detailedReviews.text: The honey wheat crust is Soo good!

detailedReviews.author: Craig Noreen
detailedReviews.text: Mama Mimi‚Äôs is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Zoey Whitmeyer
detailedReviews.text: Have and always will absolutely love Mama Mimi‚Äôs pizza! Never met a flavor there I didn‚Äôt like, but the Marmaletta Amore is my longtime favorite (been going here since they opened!).

detailedReviews.author: Chris Wingenfield
detailedReviews.text: We always love our Mama Mimi‚Äôs pizzas and salads. It‚Äôs perfect for when we don‚Äôt want to cook or have guests visiting. Mama Mimi‚Äôs pizza never disappoints!

detailedReviews.author: Summer Dee Carter
detailedReviews.text: My favorite place in pizza and lasagna!

detailedReviews.author: Lynn Marshall
detailedReviews.text: Mama Mimi‚Äôs has been my personal favorite pizza for over 20 years. I know it‚Äôs take and bake pizza but it‚Äôs better than any pizza you could get delivered or make yourself. The ingredients are so fresh and you just can‚Äôt beat them if you‚Äôve never tried it. do yourself a favor and try one of their three locations. And around the holidays, they have the world‚Äôs best cinnamon rolls

detailedReviews.author: Dan Watkins
detailedReviews.text: Always great food. Fast on the pick up today.

detailedReviews.author: Seth Marsh
detailedReviews.text: As always the food was great and the staff was awesome. We will be back soon!

detailedReviews.author: Denise Clark
detailedReviews.text: The Clintonville location is always top rate. Love the pizza and the service is always the best. They get to know their regular customers and I appreciate that!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Koolhoven
detailedReviews.text: We love grabbing a pizza here for our Friday night pizza night! It‚Äôs so nice to have take and bake, because we can have a fun little Clintonville afternoon of shopping and take it home for later! The quality is amazing and fresh, the staff really makes you feel valued as a customer and overall it‚Äôs one of our favorite pizzas in Columbus!

detailedReviews.author: Maddy O'Malley
detailedReviews.text: The Bel Giordano and Caesar salad were amaaaazing as always!

detailedReviews.author: Pam Martin
detailedReviews.text: Always love a good pizza from Mama Mimi‚Äôs!  Our 3 favorites are the queen margherita, bbq chicken and pepperoni.  Love that it‚Äôs fresh and ready to bake when we are!

detailedReviews.author: April Wilburn
detailedReviews.text: Grandview location. Very friendly and helpful. The pizza was fresh and flavorful, I  like the take and bake format. I will definitely be returning.

detailedReviews.author: Annaliese Kern
detailedReviews.text: We love Mama Mimi‚Äôs! It‚Äôs so great supporting a local business and the food is fantastic! Our favorite pizzas are the Pepperoni Trio and the Marmelletta Amore. We also love their salads, which are made with actual, quality, fresh lettuce greens rather than the usual iceberg lettuce that you get ant other pizza shops. 10/10 recommend Mama Mimi‚Äôs Take N‚Äô Bake!!

detailedReviews.author: Jan Welsh
detailedReviews.text: Best cauliflower crust I‚Äôve ever had!!!

detailedReviews.author: Laurie Hickman
detailedReviews.text:
I order the bambino pizza kits for the grands‚Ä¶. They love pizza night at nana and papa‚Äôs having their own pizza that they get to make and bake.
Love the take and bake because pizza is hot and fresh and tastes best right after coming out of the oven.

detailedReviews.author: Ellen Perera
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, great price

detailedReviews.author: Denise Giesecke Meyer
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious food, quick service and very friendly staff. Highly recommend!!!

detailedReviews.author: Suzette Henderson
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, salads, etc.

detailedReviews.author: Tyler Baker
detailedReviews.text: Give them a try, I recommend the Marmaletta Amore. Been a regular for a decade and plan on another.

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Higginbotham
detailedReviews.text: Always great!  Support local businesses!

detailedReviews.author: Jane Weiss Wright
detailedReviews.text: Food that is reliably fresh and reasonably priced, and service that is friendly

detailedReviews.author: Jennie Beal
detailedReviews.text: Mama Mimi‚Äòs pizza is always delicious and a favorite of my family. I usually order online and pick up after school for easy dinner options. They have pizza to please even the pickiest eater. I have had their lasagna before and their salads and both were delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Wood (Tajarra)
detailedReviews.text: Always super great food, these guys are my go-to for pizza! I recommend the meatball and Chicago style but really any we've tried were delicious. They make a super good Caeser salad too!

detailedReviews.author: Cory Heater-Druhot
detailedReviews.text:
I've been a long-time fan of Mama Mimi's Pizza, and I can't say enough good things about their delicious pies! From the moment I walk in the door, I'm greeted with a warm smile and the enticing aroma of fresh dough.
The menu offers a wide variety of options to please any palate. Their signature pizzas are topped with high-quality ingredients and ability to take and bake on your own. My personal favorites include the Meatball and Kohl's Favorite. The crust is crispy and flavorful, and the sauce is just the right amount of tangy.
What truly sets Mama Mimi's apart is their commitment to using fresh, locally sourced ingredients. You can taste the difference in every bite!

detailedReviews.author: Amy Ceccoli
detailedReviews.text: We love Mama Mimi's pizza.  It's fresh and delicious and the people are always so friendly.  The marmolata amore is my go to, it's a winner for a reason!

detailedReviews.author: Lachandra B. Baker
detailedReviews.text: This is our GO-TO place for pizza! The care they take in making a "just for us" pizza with premium toppings is always a delighter! We are fans for life!!!

detailedReviews.author: Vincent Lam
detailedReviews.text: Friendly service and clean place. I ordered their signature take-home chicken pizza, which tasted cheesy but a little too sweet. Hope they will open a dining-in restaurant. If so, I will not have to take home to bake and enjoy their fresh baked pizza or lasagna.

detailedReviews.author: jessica huebner
detailedReviews.text: Super friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: John Knapke
detailedReviews.text: Great staff, great lasagna!

detailedReviews.author: Gretchen Suhre
detailedReviews.text: Always friendly In person and the shop has a well organized website. Great pizzas and salads.

detailedReviews.author: Charlie byrd
detailedReviews.text: The food is very good, and the staff is very friendly. I always recommend people to go here and have a great experience. I always come back.

detailedReviews.author: Marcus Tiberius
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is always phenomenal! You cannot go wrong with any of their specialty pizzas or even a make your own custom pie. And take a moment to think Steve for his amazing work. And also to share a story about his travels! He always makes the trip worthwhile! And also thank him for his military service.

detailedReviews.author: Kim Bushrow
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza! I never thought take n bake pizza would be this good but it exceeded all my expectations‚Ä¶ definitely a must when visiting family in Columbus. Staff was super friendly and helpful when picking up the pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Ark House
detailedReviews.text: Always exceptional!

detailedReviews.author: Mel Markowitz
detailedReviews.text: Crusts are soooo good! Staff is always super friendly and helpful. Love the Rajun Cajun! Would totally recommend this establishment.

detailedReviews.author: Kristen Atha
detailedReviews.text: Great, fresh pizza and thoughtful, courteous staff!

detailedReviews.author: Jimmy Huntzinger
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was great, as was the gourmet field greens. The staff is always top notch

detailedReviews.author: Amarah Hutchinson
detailedReviews.text: Although they have great pizza I worked there for a shift and didn't get paid!  I didn't get fired and I have 13 years of pizza experience and they know as well as i know i did a good job and deserve to be compensated.I just found a better opportunity for me so i didnt return for another shift. I reached out to the person that hired me. As well as the owner and didn't get a reply back on how i'm going to get paid.It's been about two months since my shift. I thought It was a great company until they didn't pay me!

detailedReviews.author: Nicholas
detailedReviews.text:
This concept makes for the freshest pizza in the game.

The quality of the product is solid as well. I can see myself ordering a few of these and keeping them in stock

detailedReviews.author: Kenneth Williams
detailedReviews.text: My first pizza that I got from here was excellent. You pay a little bit more,  but the quality is top notch and worth it. I order occasionally when I  need to run the temperature up high on my kamado grill. Thier pizzas taste great.üëç

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Brewer
detailedReviews.text: Everytime I am at Mama Mimi‚Äôs, the staff is nice and the pizza is always ready!

detailedReviews.author: Alan McKitrick
detailedReviews.text: Easily one of favorite pizza restaurants in Columbus! Best take-n-bake bar none!

detailedReviews.author: Caroline Smith
detailedReviews.text: Mama Mimi‚Äôs never misses! The food is delicious and is ready fast. I will be back many times!!

detailedReviews.author: Melanie Boyd
detailedReviews.text: Mama Mimi‚Äòs has ruined other pizza joints for me. Nothing beats the Jon Snow. Nothing. Keep up the good work!

detailedReviews.author: J Paul
detailedReviews.text: Great for home baking when you don‚Äôt feel like doing it from scratch!  Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Dascenzo
detailedReviews.text: Love their pizza

detailedReviews.author: Katherine M
detailedReviews.text: Always an amazing pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Hume
detailedReviews.text: Always friendly and the pizza and salads are really good!

detailedReviews.author: Isabelle
detailedReviews.text: Mama Mimi‚Äôs is everything you‚Äôd want in a pizza place‚Äîfresh ingredients, nice employees and efficient service. Their pizzas, salads (esp the Caesar!!) and their tiramisu are all phenomenal!! Love everything about them and am SO GLAD they are a neighborhood staple :)

detailedReviews.author: Caleb Gloeckner
detailedReviews.text: Love their salad and pizzas!

detailedReviews.author: Meg Nauman
detailedReviews.text: This place is great. Friendly people, serving delicious pies. It‚Äôs hard to pick a favorite because there‚Äôs so much variety and so many good options. The salads are fresh and I never find a gross piece of lettuce like at other places. There‚Äôs no reason not to get the chocolate chip cookie too‚Ä¶ so chocolatey and gooey.

detailedReviews.author: Ann Klein
detailedReviews.text: Food is always good and tasty when I get it out of my oven!  Salad dressings are made in house daily and they are delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Kristen White
detailedReviews.text: The best service, highest quality ingredients, they are always open to ingredient mods and removing dairy from our pies. I have been coming here for 22 years and have always had a 5 Star experience!!

detailedReviews.author: Erica Hoard
detailedReviews.text: Delicious unique pizzas made quickly. Definitely recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Jarod Steed
detailedReviews.text: Delicious and convenient

detailedReviews.author: Michael Lowell
detailedReviews.text:
This is a take n bake pizza restaurant. I gave them a 5 on atmosphere for the friendly, helpful service.

This is the best take n bake pizza I‚Äôve had. They are very generous with fresh, high quality ingredients and I liked that the crust baked up crispy. I would highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Tina S
detailedReviews.text: Was first time here,Tony was so nice an happy. I got bread sticks an pizza both very delicious üòã recommend everyone should try

detailedReviews.author: christine ridge
detailedReviews.text: Walked in to get a pizza on 6/27 at 7pm to be greeted by the nicest staff. The two employees were very friendly, fast and made a great pizza. Thank you!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Miller
detailedReviews.text: I always get the best pies (green goddess) and salads (garden field greens) from Mama Mimi‚Äôs! Their staff at the Grandview location is always so friendly, too.

detailedReviews.author: Samuel Murphy
detailedReviews.text: üçïüçïüçïüçï

detailedReviews.author: Kate Israel
detailedReviews.text:
One of my fave regular places in Clintonville.
Honey wheat crust is the way to go! Always grab an extra pizza to bake a couple nights later.
Fabulous staff!

detailedReviews.author: Anisha D'Costa
detailedReviews.text: The take and bake aspect of pizza is nice. Fresh ingredients and home baked made the pizzas wonderful. However I was a bit careless and burnt my wrist with the paper while removing it from the oven. Other than that the pizzas tasted wonderful.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Cooksey
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious!  Pizza, lasagna and especially the tiramisu!  Staff is courteous and friendly - and efficient.   If you haven‚Äôt tried take and bake pizza before, it‚Äôs totally worth it!   Convenient and piping hot fresh at home‚Ä¶ they‚Äôve been around forever and there‚Äôs a good reason why they‚Äôre still here!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Rager
detailedReviews.text: Awesome small business and my favorite location. It‚Äôs extremely easy to order online ahead of time and know that it will be ready when you arrive.  Great workers too!

detailedReviews.author: Christina Leasure
detailedReviews.text: So yummy!  They have so many options.  Their BBQ chicken pizza is a favorite at our house.  Ordered another specialty pizza that was missing key ingredients (partially my fault for not checking before leaving the restaurant).   Owner was responsive and fixed the issue.   This will be in our regular pizza rotation!  Their cinnamon rolls that they offer near the holidays are out of this world.

detailedReviews.author: Nick Kratz
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was incredible. We got their speciality pepperoni with honey wheat crust. The guy working was really nice and helpful too.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.9/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the convenience and flexibility of baking Mama Mimi's pizzas at home on their own timeline. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The use of fresh, quality ingredients and unique flavor combinations in Mama Mimi's pizzas consistently impresses customers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The excellent customer service at Mama Mimi's is frequently praised by customers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Lack of dining-in option and desire for fresh baked experience - social media marketing can improve this area
Missing ingredients in orders - review management can address this concern
Negative experience with employee payment - review management can address this concern
